snippet: It has been five and a half years since Hurricane Ike pounded the Gulf Coast, killing dozens of people, pushing homes off their slabs and inflicting tens of billions of dollars in damage.
lead_paragraph: It has been five and a half years since Hurricane Ike pounded the Gulf Coast, killing dozens of people, pushing homes off their slabs and inflicting tens of billions of dollars in damage.

headline.main: Years After Hurricane, Political Storm Still Blows Over Claims
headline.print_headline: Years After Hurricane, Political Storm Still Blows Over Claims
